p: Fig 1 shows the annual cycle of dengue incidence rates (per 100,000 population), the SPI-6, and Tmin in Barbados from June 1999 to May 2016. Dengue outbreaks occurred in the dengue seasons 2003–2004, 2007–2008, 2010–2011, 2013–2014, 2014–2015 and 2015–2016. Severe droughts (negative SPI-6 values) occurred in 2002–2003, 2009–2010, and 2015–2016, which coincided with El Niño events (see S4 Fig). During wetter than average rainy seasons, dengue outbreaks tended to peak earlier in the dengue season, in September (see S5 Fig).
